snippet: As Arizona seeks to avoid the mistakes of other states, some say its dispensary program could serve as a national model, particularly because of its emphasis on medical supervision.
abstract: Entrepreneurs who supply medical marijuana in other states are eager to acquire Arizona's newly-issued dispensary licenses; the state has established one of the country's strictest set of requirements governing medical marijuana sales, lending the new industry a sense of legitimacy that has reassured investors.
lead_paragraph: As Arizona seeks to avoid the mistakes of other states, some say its dispensary program could serve as a national model, particularly because of its emphasis on medical supervision.

headline.seo: Arizona Laws Attract Medical Marijuana Business
headline.main: Arizona Tries to Keep Reins Tight as It Starts Regulating Medical Marijuana
headline.print_headline: Arizona Tries to Keep Reins Tight as It Starts Regulating Medical Marijuana
